channel.title: Built with Haunt, a Scheme Static Site generator

item.title: My first post!
item.author: ano@contact.me (A.N. Other)
item.description:
My first post!

This is a static website and blog.

The source is written in Skribe, a document format that allows you to use embed scheme programs to create your document.

1 + 2 + 3 = 6
